responses: {"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"In the video, questions were asked of each participants to answer. I think the captions did not fully capture what each person was saying. Some words spoken were not captioned. Some appeared in the caption later making it difficult for viewers to go with the flow"}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"The video features a parent and his daughter being interviewed by TV personalities about the behavior and character of each other. Regarding the captioning, well, it's close to capturing everything said, but not all. For example, when the girl mentioned \"I mean like\", it was not shown at first, but shown later."}

{"useful_question":"2","enjoy_question":"2","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"The video was about the problem faced by students in maths homework being too much. The captions are not helpful because the captions do not reflect the spoken words at the same time. Words spoken appeared later in the captions. Not helpful. Another issue is that a title shown on the screen \"Too Much Homework\" overlap the captioning and makes it difficult to read the captions"}
{"useful_question":"5","enjoy_question":"5","easy_to_follow_question":"5","comment":"Not sure what the topic of the video is. However, the captions match the voice pretty well"}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"Video talking about the man's wife and family. The captions are good. But the emojis do not help in knowing who is speaking what"}

{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"Talking about technology advances. Captions are good, however, the captions need to be paced with the speech and be made synchronous "}
{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"Video talking about the man's hobbies. The captions are not synchronous. Not paced with the speech."}

{"useful_question":"5","enjoy_question":"5","easy_to_follow_question":"5","comment":"Video talking about some interesting scenery. The captions are perfectly synchronous and well paced. Thumbs up on this!"}

{"useful_question":"5","enjoy_question":"5","easy_to_follow_question":"5","comment":"Talking about how the two friends met and their experience. The captions are perfectly synchronous. However, I don't like the emojis in the captions. "}
{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"Talking about meeting encounters. The captions are not synchronous. slow paced, and not quite helpful"}

{"useful_question":"3","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"Not sure what is being talked about because it's hard to follow the caption and the speech. The captions are not synchronous and not useful. "}

{"useful_question":"5","enjoy_question":"5","easy_to_follow_question":"5","comment":"Talking about movie character and their real life relationship. The captions are wow! I like the use of different font colors which helps viewers to know who is speaking what. The captions are synchronous. It's great!"}
